title: Reality of a Dream
description: Emma had no idea how writing a letter to a Scottish boy ten years ago would change her life.When she loses her family in a horrific accident, Billy invites her to spend time at his cottage in the middle of the Highlands, and there among the legends of the Scottish Moors, he introduces her to his life. With his help, Emma learns that she can find happiness and live again.
author: Maela Torre
